Lwalu, nke a makwara dịka Lwalwa, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke Democratic Republic of the Congo
Nchịkọta ya edoghị anya: Nọọsụ (2003), na-esote Ahmed (1995), na-enye asụsụ L.20 niile nke Guthrie na Luban, gụnyere Lwalu
Maho (2009) depụtara L.22 Mbagani (nke na-enweghị koodu ISO) dị ka ihe jikọrọ ya na ya
E nwere ike kpọkwa Mbagani Binji, a na-agbagwoju ya anya n'akwụkwọ na asụsụ Binji
Ethnologue na-akpọ ebe Maho nyere Mbagani dị ka Songe.
